specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Yarn Effect > Chenille Chenille yarn is made by twisting short fibers between two core yarns, creating a soft and fuzzy surface. Its name means "caterpillar," which reflects its fuzzy, caterpillar-like texture. It gives the fabric a velvet-like softness and cozy feel.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not iron Recommended Use Dresses
